title: Maul
content:
u will see "Shabby Wooden Doors". You will need a lock pick check to open the place. Once inside the place, go downstairs and find a "Wooden Trunk", there's the Maul Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Dammon at The Hollow (Druid Grove). Dropped by:

Entering by the East Gate (after crossing the bridge with dead goblins and tieflings). The gate has the sign "Moonhaven" with a dead tiefling next to it. Cross the gate and you will find a "Water Pump" on your right. From the pump, turn slightly to the right
